script.speaker: scammer
script.text: Namaste, main SBI bank ke fraud department se baat kar raha hun. Aapka naam kya hai?

script.speaker: victim
script.text: Haan, main Rajesh Kumar hun. Kya problem hai?

script.speaker: scammer
script.text: Sir, aapke account mein suspicious activity detect hui hai. Kya aapne koi online transaction ki hai aaj?

script.speaker: victim
script.text: Nahi, maine koi transaction nahi ki hai. Kya hua hai?

script.speaker: scammer
script.text: Sir, aapke account se 50,000 rupees ka transaction hua hai. Aapko OTP share karna hoga verification ke liye.

script.speaker: victim
script.text: Main OTP share nahi kar sakta. Aap directly bank se contact karein.

script.speaker: scammer
script.text: Hello sir, main Microsoft se call kar raha hun. Aapke computer mein virus aa gaya hai.

script.speaker: victim
script.text: Really? Kaise pata chala? Main toh kuch notice nahi kiya.

script.speaker: scammer
script.text: Sir, hamare system mein alert aaya hai. Aapko remote access dena hoga check karne ke liye.

script.speaker: victim
script.text: Remote access? Yeh safe hai? Main thoda suspicious hun.

script.speaker: scammer
script.text: Bilkul safe hai sir. Main Microsoft certified engineer hun. Aapko 5000 rupees charge karna hoga service ke liye.

script.speaker: victim
script.text: Main payment nahi kar sakta. Aap directly Microsoft website se contact karein.

script.speaker: scammer
script.text: Congratulations! You have won $50,000 in our international lottery. Your number was randomly selected.

script.speaker: victim
script.text: Really? I never entered any lottery. How is this possible?

script.speaker: scammer
script.text: Your phone number was automatically entered. You just need to pay processing fees of $500 to claim your prize.

script.speaker: victim
script.text: I need to pay money to get money? That doesn't sound right.

script.speaker: scammer
script.text: It's standard procedure sir. We need to verify your identity and process the transfer.

script.speaker: victim
script.text: I'm not comfortable with this. I'll pass on the prize.

script.speaker: scammer
script.text: Namaste sir, main investment advisor hun. Aapko ek great opportunity mili hai 50% return ke saath.

script.speaker: victim
script.text: 50% return? Yeh kaise possible hai? Market mein itna high return nahi milta.

script.speaker: scammer
script.text: Sir, yeh crypto investment hai. Hamare clients ko regular profit mil raha hai. Minimum 1 lakh invest karna hoga.

script.speaker: victim
script.text: Crypto risky hai. Main thoda research kar leta hun.

script.speaker: scammer
script.text: Sir, yeh limited time offer hai. Aaj invest karein toh 100% guarantee hai profit ki.

script.speaker: victim
script.text: Main abhi invest nahi kar sakta. Aapko koi document share kar sakte hain?

recording_instructions.audio_quality: Record in quiet environment with good microphone
recording_instructions.speakers: Use different voices for scammer and victim
recording_instructions.emotions: Scammer: persuasive, urgent. Victim: cautious, suspicious
recording_instructions.languages: Use appropriate language mix for Hinglish conversations

scammer_indicators: Pretending to be from official organizations
Asking for OTP, passwords, or sensitive data
